`` We had been telling her that she was inspiring the country with her courage and that we couldn't wait to take her out to pizza and a weekend away,'' Kirsten Gillibrand said through a spokeswoman. Then, after she heard our voices and the encouragement of Mark Kelson and her parents, she struggled briefly and opened her eyes for the very first time. It was a miracle to witness. `` My heart was overflowing with love for my friend Gabrielle Giffords today,'' Debbie Wasserman Schultz said in a prepared statement.`` It was absolutely incredible to witness Gabrielle Giffords open her eyes.
